name: Shift at Twisters 2
description:
this is the sequel to SaT where you the nightguard Daniel is having his series of nightmares in between his shifts in the first game you have to fend off the night terrors before they reach your dream manifestation of yourself.

CONTROLS

Look----------------------------------------------------mouse

shift----------------------------------------------------play/stop music box

s---------------------------------------------------------window

f-----------------------------------------------------------flashlight

play the music box when night terror legion is in your room, make sure to check on night terror chip to make sure he does not make any progress to making it in your house, and when you hear laughing make sure you flashlight is on! or else...
